title: *OFFICIAL*.    2nd round counselling on Aug 25th
content: Aug 23 is the final date for submitting documents and 25th Aug is counselling round 2

comments.body: When would they intimate about the available seats and stuff, and why do the motherfuckers have to do this way later than comedk cancellation deadline. Fuck You PES.

probably a day before the 2nd round, that's how it was last year. pes conducts 2nd round counselling of pessat after round 1 results of kcet are announced. comedk dates and pessat counselling dates have no correlation.
I mean it's a gamble for those who'd be leaving their comedk seats, what if they pull a scam like last year with "-ve" seats.
I can only see ‘August, 2024’ in their important dates, from where did you get this info ?

It’s on the same page itself
Maybe just reload the page

https://pes.edu/important-dates/
got itt, thanks, it was showing something different here, maybe they didn't updated it [https://admissions.pes.edu/registration/Impdates.html](https://admissions.pes.edu/registration/Impdates.html)

Just wanted to know whether the counselling for pes that is first and second round is over or not?
Because I haven’t got any messages or mail regarding the counselling

1st round was completed in May
2nd round will be conducted on 25th Aug
Ok, but I haven’t received any mails or messages regarding counselling

For round 1, they have sent email regarding counselling 
They haven’t sent the mail yet regarding Round 2
so orientation most probably on 2nd sep
i think college starts a week after 2nd round not sure
